The Stranger.requires: |Signaloscope| and |Signal > DeepSpace| and {OptOne(|Stranger Access|)} and |@DLC - Stranger Entrance:1|

DreamWorld General._comment: Contains locations that doesnt belong to any specific Dreamworld (like the river or just entering the dreamworld in general)

Shrouded Woodlands Archive.requires: (|DreamWorld Loading Glitch| and (|EYE > River Lowlands Flame| or (|EYE > Cinder Isles Flame| and |DreamWorld Door Candles|) or (|EYE > Hidden Gorge Flame| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|)) )) or (|EYE > River Lowlands Flame| and |DreamWorld Fake Fireplace| and ((|EYE > Cinder Isles Flame| and |DreamWorld Door Candles|) or (|EYE > Hidden Gorge Flame| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|))))

Starlit Cove Archive.requires: |DreamWorld Door Candles| and (|DreamWorld Death Glitch| or (|DreamWorld Grabbing Hands| and |DreamWorld Hidden Hand|))

Endless Canyon Archive.requires: |DreamWorld Render Glitch| or (|DreamWorld Fake Wall| and ( |DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|))

Subterranean Lake.requires: (|EYE > Submerged Structure Flame| or ((|DreamWorld Loading Glitch| and (|EYE > River Lowlands Flame| or (|EYE > Cinder Isles Flame| and |DreamWorld Door Candles|) or (|EYE > Hidden Gorge Flame| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hands|)) ))) )
